info.title: Fitmeup API
info.description: This is an API to manage gyms, users and comments.

ApiKeyAuth.name: Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: ⚠️⚠️⚠️ The value must have this structure "Bearer <here_access_token>" ⚠️⚠️⚠️

post.description: Login endpoint for all kind of users [admin, superadmin, user]

parameters.name: user credentials
parameters.description: User credentials to log in to the system.

post.description: Endpoint to register admins and users. If you want to register a user with role admin you have to pass Super Admin access token. If you want to register a user with role user you don't have to pass any access token.

parameters.name: user info
parameters.description: User info to register into the system.

application/json.message: The gym you are trying to sign up for doesn't exist

get.description: Endpoint to retrieve my information, You have to pass your generated access token

post.description: Endpoint to refresh access token, if it has expired.

examples.message: Your access token has been refreshed

application/json.message: There's a conflict with your refresh token

get.description: This endpoint is for register a new user to choosen gym.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token generated when user is registered

post.description: This endpoint is for register a new gym. User must be an admin.

parameters.name: user info
parameters.description: This endpoint is for register a new gym.

example.name: Gym test
example.description: Queremos tener un impacto real sobre la vida de millones de personas, ayudándoles a cuidar de su bienestar físico.
example.address: Centro Comercial A Laxe, planta 2,  local 26

put.description: This endpoint is for update an existing gym. Just the owner of the gym can update it.

parameters.description: This endpoint is for update a gym.

delete.summary: Delete a gym and its comments
delete.description: This endpoit deletes a gym and its coments. Just his owner can delete it.

get.summary: Get all users of a gym
get.description: This endpoint is for retreive a gym by its ID and all assigned users to it.

post.description: This endpoint is for post a comment about a gym. Just a user can post comments about his gym.

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: This endpoint is for post a comment about a gym. Just a user can post comments about his gym.

application/json.message: You are not a user, then you cannot post a comment.
The gym with id <gymId> does not exists

get.description: This endpoit is for retreive all comments from a gym by gymId. Just the admin of the gym can get all comments of his gym.

application/json.message: You are not a user, then you cannot post a comment.
Gym with id <gymID> does not exists

get.description: This endpoint is for retreive all assigned gyms of an admin.
